com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib

Class SensorOrientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib.SensorOrientation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.hardware.SensorEventListener

    public class SensorOrientation
extends Object
implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener
    Calculates current orientation from sensors.
    Author:
    Dieter Adriaenssens

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SensorOrientation.OrientationEventListener
      Event listener interface for SensorOrientation updates.

      void addEventListener(SensorOrientation.OrientationEventListener listener)
      Adds the listener to eventListenerList.
      double getOrientation()
      Gets current SensorOrientation.
      boolean hasOrientation()
      Checks if an orientation can be provided : - required sensors are available - sensor values were recently updated.

      Returns true if the required sensors are available : - TYPE_MAGNETIC_FIELD - TYPE_ACCELEROMETER.

      Returns true if use of sensors is enabled - TYPE_MAGNETIC_FIELD - TYPE_ACCELEROMETER.
